title: China Communist Party Launches War Against Crypto-Enabled Fraud
description:
In a resolute declaration, the Communist Party of China has taken a firm stance against the rising tide of overseas telecommunications fraud executed via crypto technology. Specifically, the government denounced the perpetrators exploiting innovative technologies such as blockchain, metaverse, cryptocurrency, and AI to orchestrate deceitful schemes. Prominent Chinese reporter Colin Wu took to Twitter recently […]
